statements: SELECT * FROM phishing_pages
SELECT page_name, image_path FROM phishing_pages
SELECT page_id, page_name, screenshot_path FROM phishing_pages WHERE page_id = 1
SELECT * FROM phishing_pages ORDER BY date_added DESC
SELECT page_id, image_path FROM phishing_pages WHERE page_id > 3
SELECT * FROM phishing_pages WHERE page_id = 1;
SELECT page_name, image_path FROM phishing_pages WHERE page_name LIKE '%example%';
SELECT * FROM phishing_pages ORDER BY date_added DESC;
SELECT page_id, page_name, screenshot_path FROM phishing_pages WHERE date_added > '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM phishing_pages;
SELECT * FROM phishing_images;
SELECT image_id, image_url FROM phishing_images WHERE image_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM phishing_screenshots WHERE screenshot_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT screenshot_url FROM phishing_screenshots ORDER BY screenshot_date DESC;
SELECT screenshot_id, screenshot_url, screenshot_notes FROM phishing_screenshots WHERE screenshot_notes IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM phishing_images;
SELECT image_id, image_url FROM phishing_images WHERE image_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY image_id DESC;
SELECT screenshot_url FROM phishing_screenshots WHERE screenshot_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY screenshot_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM phishing_images LEFT JOIN phishing_screenshots ON phishing_images.image_id = phishing_screenshots.screenshot_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_images FROM phishing_images;
SELECT * FROM phishing_images WHERE id = 1
SELECT id, image_url FROM phishing_images WHERE date_uploaded > '2022-01-01 00:00:00'
SELECT link_url, page_title FROM phishing_links WHERE id BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY page_title ASC
SELECT report_id, report_date FROM phishing_reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY report_date DESC
SELECT id, image_url, date_uploaded, analysis_results FROM phishing_images WHERE id = 3
SELECT * FROM phishing_images ORDER BY date_uploaded DESC
SELECT link_url, page_title FROM phishing_links WHERE date_discovered >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT image_url, JSON_VALUE(analysis_results, '$.result') AS analysis_result FROM phishing_images WHERE id = 3
SELECT AVG(id) AS average_id FROM phishing_reports
SELECT id, report_id FROM phishing_reports ORDER BY report_date ASC
SELECT * FROM user_accounts;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_accounts WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT url, screenshot FROM phishing_pages WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM phishing_attempts ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT analysis_id, result_text FROM analysis_results WHERE result_text LIKE '%phishing%';
SELECT * FROM phishing_pages;
SELECT url, image FROM phishing_pages WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM phishing_attempts GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM analysis_results ORDER BY analysis_id DESC;
SELECT username, password FROM user_accounts WHERE username LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT * FROM phishing_images;
SELECT id, image_url FROM phishing_images ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT image_url, screenshot_url FROM phishing_images WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM phishing_reports WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT report_date, status FROM phishing_reports ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM phishing_images WHERE id = 1;
SELECT image_url, timestamp FROM phishing_images WHERE screenshot_url IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM phishing_reports WHERE status = 'pending' ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT link_url, screenshot_url FROM phishing_links ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT username, email FROM phishing_users WHERE password = 'strongPassword123';
